name: Sujaya Foundation

address: Adarsh Guest House, Above Adarsh Mithai Mandir, Nana Chowk, Grant Road (W),

briefDescription: Sujaya Foundation is a not for profit organisation aimed at bridging the linguistic and digital divide in modern India.  The Foundation works with Various sections of the underprivileged- primary and secondary school children in vernacular medium schools;youth hoping to secure jobs;mentally & physically challenged youth & women seeking a place in the sun.
